channel.title: Noinfo file not found : ERROR!
channel.description:
im starting to get REAL mad because of ALL the scources on this website!! :mad: every time I download a scource I start the server, start moaprscape 3.2 BUT when I try to log on :either : (1)it is the first time and i log on for like 3 seconds and i get "connection lost, attempting to re-establish OR (2)it is not the first time i log on and it says on the server command prompt : "USERNAME has signed on to the server." and thean "_: Moreinfo file not found" -AND- on moparscape when number two is happing it says: "connecting to server..." but when the server says ""_: Moreinfo file not found" mopar says : "error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "cancel" Then "Start server" to make your own." any ideas?? :( :o
please read over a couple of times if you don't understand :) ... it was kind of hard to explain... PLEASE REPLY! THIS IS SO ANNOYING!! :|

item.title: Noinfo file not found : ERROR!
item.dc:creator: @shock -shock-
item.description:
@shock wrote:

thanks but… copy and paste from where to where?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 09, 2006, 10:06:18 AM[/size][hr]sorry for all of the nooby questions… :o[br][size=1]Posted at: December 09, 2006, 11:10:58 AM[/size][hr]HELLO!!! :mad: :mad: ANYBODY GOING TO REPLY??? :mad: :mad: :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: Noinfo file not found : ERROR!
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

Hmm… I think i just copy and pasted playerhandler.java and server.java to fix that error once
-Shadow

Read full topic

item.title: Noinfo file not found : ERROR!
item.dc:creator: @shock -shock-
item.description:
@shock wrote:

Ya, thanks! that worked! but… sadily it lead me to another pain staking error…
here is a picture:

http://mxb.dk/upload/LAME_error.JPG

it keeps trying to connect and than id disconnects then it repeats… :o

Read full topic

item.title: Noinfo file not found : ERROR!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This means that you are trying to log on as a new member and there is no moreinfo file. Make sure that the Class files are in the same direectory as the folder named “moreinfo”.

Read full topic

im starting to get REAL mad because of ALL the scources on this website!! :mad: every time I download a scource I start the server, start moaprscape 3.2 BUT when I try to log on :either : (1)it is the first time and i log on for like 3 seconds and i get "connection lost, attempting to re-establish OR (2)it is not the first time i log on and it says on the server command prompt : “USERNAME has signed on to the server.”
and thean “: Moreinfo file not found"
-AND-
on moparscape when number two is happing it says: “connecting to server…” but when the server says “”: Moreinfo file not found” mopar says : “error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “cancel” Then “Start server” to make your own.” any ideas?? :o

please read over a couple of times if you don’t understand … it was kind of hard to explain… PLEASE REPLY! THIS IS SO ANNOYING!!
